cab.content: S EG R E T.Meeting of Ministers and others held at no. 10 Downing Street, on Wednesday, the18th February, 1942, at 6.30 p. in.PRESENT:The Right Hon.; Winston S. Churchill, M.P.,Prime Minister. (In the Chair)The Right Hon. Viscount Simon,Lord Chancellor.The Right Hon. Sir Andrew Duncan,.M.P., Minister of Supply.The Right Hon. R.A. Butler, M.P. ,President of the Board ofEducation.The Right Hon. R.S. Hudson, M.P. ,"Minister of Agriculture andFisheries.The Right Hon. Thomas Johnston, M.P.Secretary of State for Scotland.Colonel The Right Hon. J.J.LlewellinM.P., President of the Board ofTrade.The Right Hon. Ernest Brown, M.P.,Minister of Health.The Right Hon. Lord Reith, Ministerof Works and Buildings and first commissioner of Works.The Right Hon. J.T.C. Moore-Brabazon, The Right Hon. Lord Leathers,M.P., Minister of Aircraft Minister of War Transport.Production.The Right Hon. Lord Woolton, Minister The Right Hon A. Duff Cooper, M.P.,of Food.The Right Hon. Hugh Dal ton, M.P. ,Minister of Economic Warfare.The Right Hon. Lord Hankey,Paymaster-General.Chancellor of the Duchy of lancaster.The Right Hon. W.S. Morrison, M.P.Postmaster-General.The Right Hon. James Stuart, M.P.,Parliamentary Secretary to theTreasury.Colonel G.S. Harvie Watt, M.P.,Parliamentary Private Secretary tothe Prime Minister.. No teg The War Situation was discussed, with special reference/" to the Far East.
